alert.note: Alert for Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 3:31AM EST until December 11 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
